text:
This is your daily reminder that while Democrats were focused on impeachment—President Trump addressed the Chinese Coronavirus in his State of the Union Address

...And Pelosi tore up every word.

We cover all things Virus AND MORE: https://t.co/oDNl6kiBLn
https://t.co/YcEI2xO7r6
